unnormalised: Hey guys, any update on Jadeja's knee? Saw him limping near Eden Gardens last week. Also, heard young Rohan pulled a hamstring – hope he recovers before the Ranji Trophy! Dr. Sharma's supposed to be the best in Delhi. Wish them a speedy recovery. Thinking positive vibes only! Maybe some haldi doodh will help? Heard the new physiotherapy centre in Bangalore is massive, like 5000 sq ft! Rs. 500 a session, apparently.
normalised: Hey guys, any update on Jadeja's knee? Saw him limping near Eden Gardens last week. Also, heard young Rohan pulled a hamstring – hope he recovers before the Ranji Trophy! Doctor Sharma's supposed to be the best in Delhi. Wish them a speedy recovery. Thinking positive vibes only! Maybe some turmeric milk will help? Heard the new physiotherapy centre in Bangalore is massive, like five thousand square feet! Rupee five hundred a session, apparently.
